Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player is an abstract class and is designed to be used in the game Racko. It is responsible for everything a Player would have as if playing right on a table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int currentScore
      Score that the Player has in their hand
      protected Card ExtraCard
      Card that is picked up, but not in the Rack
      protected Rack Hand
      Rack that the Player has
      protected java.lang.String name
      Name of the Player
      protected int score
      Running score that the Player has accumulated

        public abstract void pickupCard(Card C)

        public Card getExtraCard()
        Gets the Card that isn't in the Rack, but isn't discarded yet
        Returns:
        Card that was just picked up

      • printHand

        public void printHand()
        Prints the contents of the Player's Rack to the command line

      • choosePile

        public abstract int choosePile(Card Top)
        Decides what Deck to pick up from based on the Card that is on top.
        Parameters:
        Top - The top of the deck that is being looked at.
        Returns:
        The choice of the deck, 1 for the discard deck and 0 for the draw deck

      • chooseDiscard

        public abstract Card chooseDiscard(Card D)
        Chooses what Card to discard, either the extra Card or a Card in the Rack. The chosen Card is passed to the Rack to adjust itself based on the choice.
        Parameters:
        D - The chosen Card to discard
        Returns:
        Card that was discarded

      • takeTurn

        public Card takeTurn(Card C)
        Handles a Player's turn and their decisions that they make for their turn.
        Parameters:
        C - The Card that is picked up at the beginning of the turn
        Returns:
        The Card that is discarded

      • printRack

        public void printRack()
        Prints the contents of the Rack to the command line
